title: All-Party Parliamentary Group for Excellence in the Built Environment
purpose: The APPG brings together parliamentarians and industry to examine strategic issues across planning, design, construction, and maintenance. It promotes cross-sector collaboration and investigates key challenges impacting the built environment, from housing and infrastructure to sustainability, safety, and quality of life for communities.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 0207 219 3000.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Graham Watts, Construction Industry Council. Tel: 0207 399 7402
contact_details.secretariat: Construction Industry Council acts as the group's secretariat. https://www.cic.org.uk/
